title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Instruction for Transferring Medical Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective communication skills while performing patient-doctor role-plays in simulation environments reflecting real-world scenarios.
Learners can evaluate their communication performance through video recording analysis and develop improvement plans incorporating appropriateness criteria (JOS-type-c).
Learners can design strategies to adapt and apply medical communication skills to various educational contexts and submit them as project deliverables.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
